entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
